div.h6: This Purchase Order is subject to the terms and conditions incorporated herein by this reference. Please refer to other terms and conditions given overleaf. Tear off and return the acknowledgement to us within one week from the date of receipt of this order addressed to MATERIAL DEPARTMENT.
TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF PURCHASE ORDER

ol.li: 1) The component drawings provided are the sole property of Kurlon -and should be used only for the purpose of manufacturing and supplying the same as stated in this purchase order. The drawings should not be copied or lent and should be returned to us when demanded.

2) All materials must be exactly as per specification(s) and will be subject to our 100% inspection and approval at any time within 30 days after delivery. When rejections are associated at more than 5% at the time of primary inspection, total quantity is liable to be rejected.
3) Periodic Progress Reports should be submitted in regard to the supplies to be made.
4) All the material in this order should be supplied within the specified time stated therein and timely delivery shall be deemed to be the essence of the Purchase Order.

5) lf this order is not executed within the specified period or time or the material supplied is not of the contract quality or not according to the specifications required by the company, the Company will be entitled to reject the materials and treat the order as cancelled and buy its requirements in the open market on suppliers account and the supplier. There by agrees to make good the loss or damage so suffered. The rejected materials should be removed by the supplier on his own account, risk and responsibility.
6) Goods dispatched by V.P.P. or documents presented through Bank will not be accepted.
7) All materials should be properly packed, wherever packing is necessary, to withstand transit hazards.
8) The packages should clearly indicate the Purchase Order number and the date, gross weight and nett weight, Brief description of the contents and should contain the packing list.

9) The supplier should guarantee for the material supplied against defects in workmanship for a period of 12 months from the date of receipt at destination and supplier should replace, free of charge, any material that may fail or show signs of failure during this period at Purchasers premises.

10) The company assumes no obligation in relation to any goods delivered in excess of those specifically ordered. In case of mechanized components 5% variation in quality is allowed and any quantity produced more than this will not be accepted without prior permission in writing.

11) In the event of production of any of our work being interfered with or stopped by strike, or lock-out, shortage of labour, breakdown or accident to machinery, or other circumstances beyond the company's control the Company may suspend the order delivery date to such an extent as it necessary, without incurring liability.

12) Invoices in triplicate must be sent by the supplier to the Company clearly mentioning there in the R.R./Lorry way bill and other references pertaining to the despatch with the date of despatch, the packing note and other relevant details concerning the supply. The original and a copy of the invoice pertaining to the despatch should be sent to the consignee, and the second copy together with packing notes, Lorry/Rail Receipt or other reference of the despatch should be posted to the Purchase Dept.
13) No, variation in the above terms should be done without prior permission in writing from us.
14) Transportation: The Truck / Vehicle transporting our material must have a valid emission test certificate from the govt recognised emission test center.

15) ESI/PF : It is Vendor/Contractor responsibility to cover the people who are working in our site with ESI and PF before initiating the work. The people who are working in our site should carry valid Voted ID / Aadhaar Card for Age Proof.

16) Safety precaution: You should take utmost care in providing safety to the workmen at site while at work with necessary personal protective equipments. You should take work permit before starting of the work inside our plant / office from the respective safety officer. Without work permit you should not carryout the work. You should employ only experienced workmen to carryout the work.
17) Child Labor : You should also certify that the above mentioned work is not carried out using child labour as per the child labour act.
